DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to show that a low lactose milk-based infant formula supports normal growth in healthy term infants.
DOC.brief_title: Growth and Safety of a Low Lactose Milk-Based Infant Formula
DOC.detailed_description: Infants will be fed a low lactose milk-based formula for 16 weeks. Growth and formula tolerability will be assessed.
DOC.criteria: healthy term infants birth weight 2500 4500 g singleton birth 37 42 weeks gestation clinically significant abnormal findings (as determined by the investigator) on the physical examination or medical history receiving medications other than vitamins
